C

compresseAll(String, String) - Method in class SystemSolaire.SaveHtmlProg
this method browse the tree of Html Directory's recursively by this browse we create the instances of SiteMap and add it to the GeneratSiteMap also create the instances of HtmlFile and add it to the ArrayList after that we collect her tags TITLE and H1
compresseAllJarIndex(String) - Method in class SystemSolaire.SaveHtmlProg
it's the same method as compresseAll but here we use it in the console mode because in the console model at each execution we leave the code so the ArrayList of HtmlFile will be empty so in this case we have to re-brows the directory and generate the Indexation
Console - Class in SystemSolaire
Console is a Java Class which allows us to test our project on a line of command , this class represents a passage of argument to main | to genre the sitemap : java -jar cli.jar -d "Diractory path" -o sitemap.xml , to genre the indexation : java -jar cli.jar -d "Diractory path" -c data.ser , to search : java -jar cli.jar -s soleil , Frames : java -jar gui.jar ,
Console() - Constructor for class SystemSolaire.Console
 
ConsoleEclipse - Class in SystemSolaire
 
ConsoleEclipse() - Constructor for class SystemSolaire.ConsoleEclipse
